panels.description:
All instances among pgsql cluster ${cls}

Instance: Goto PGSQL Instance

IP: Goto PGSQL Node

Status: Goto PGSQL Service

Load: max(cpu,postgres,pgbouncer)

Space: Disk space usage max(all device)

Proxy: session number, Goto Haproxy Admin Page
panels.title: Postgres Instances

panels.description: Pgbouncer transactions per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Transaction Commit

panels.description: postgres rollbacked transactions per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Transaction Rollback

panels.description: coefficient of variation, CV of TPS in last 5 minutes
panels.title: TPS Variation σ/µ (5m)

panels.description: Pgbouncer transactions per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: TPS

panels.description: Pgbouncer average transaction response time in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Xact RT

panels.description: coefficient of variation, CV of Pgbouncer TPS in last 5 minutes
panels.title: Pgbouncer TPS Variation σ/µ (5m)

panels.description: coefficient of variation, CV of Pgbouncer Xact RT in last 5 minutes
panels.title: Pgbouncer RT Variation σ/µ (5m)

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
